atk_abil: Normal Attack: Attacks multiple targets with its long spear.
Skill Attack: Flies to the enemy's base and then attacks multiple targets.
Special Ability 1: Increases the game speed by 5% and increases the movement speed and the critical damage of Human units by 5%.
Special Ability 2: Appears near the enemies at its first appearance, and casts buff to increase the its own movement speed and attack speed.
Special Ability 3: Unaffected by attacks by terrain above stage 10,000 and become immune to freezing, and paralysis.
Special Ability 4: Instantly move to first attack target (dash).

Tribe Friendliness: Increases the Tribe Friendliness for Human by 10 points for each 5-star Winged Knight, and 20 points for each 6-star Winged Knight. It is applied even when Winged Knight is in Time Shop and does not exceed 400 points. (The medal buff increases as much as the Tribe Friendliness for the Knightage Hero's tribe that you revive from.)

Wings of Zephyrus: Increases the effieciency of boosting game speed(x2,x3,x5) by 0.05 for each 5-star Winged Knight(0.1 for 6-star). This would be activated by Winged Knight in your current team, NOT in Time Shop. For example, if you have four 5-star Winged Knights and three 6-star Winged Knights in your current team, then the game speed(x2,x3,x5) will be x2.5, x3.5 and x.5.5, respectively.
atk_abil_sr: Normal Attack: Attacks multiple targets with its long spear.
Skill Attack: Flies to the enemy's base and then attacks multiple targets.
Special Ability 1: Increases the game speed by 10% and increases the movement speed and the critical damage of Human units by 7%.
Special Ability 2: Appears near the enemies at its first appearance, and casts buff to increase the its own movement speed and attack speed.
Special Ability 3: Unaffected by attacks by terrain above stage 10,000 and become immune to freezing, and paralysis.
Special Ability 4: Instantly move to first attack target (dash).

Tribe Friendliness: Increases the Tribe Friendliness for Human by 10 points for each 5-star Winged Knight, and 20 points for each 6-star Winged Knight. It is applied even when Winged Knight is in Time Shop and does not exceed 400 points. (The medal buff increases as much as the Tribe Friendliness for the Knightage Hero's tribe that you revive from.)

Wings of Zephyrus: Increases the effieciency of boosting game speed(x2,x3,x5) by 0.05 for each 5-star Winged Knight(0.1 for 6-star). This would be activated by Winged Knight in your current team, NOT in Time Shop. For example, if you have four 5-star Winged Knights and three 6-star Winged Knights in your current team, then the game speed(x2,x3,x5) will be x2.5, x3.5 and x.5.5, respectively.

buffs.description: Increases the Tribe Friendliness for Human even if Winged Knight is in the Time Shop (5-star 10, 6 star 20, Max 400).
buffs.name: Tribe Friendliness

buffs.description: Increases the effieciency of boosting game speed when Winged Knight is included in your team (5-star 0.05, 6-star 0.1). For example, if you have four 5-star Winged Knights and three 6-star Winged Knights in your current team, then the game speed(x2,x3,x5) will be x2.5, x3.5 and x5.5, respectively.
buffs.name: Wings of Zephyrus
